info.name: LDR Anonymize Content
info.description:
Hide ID and feeds and some numbers of Live Dwango Reader (livedoor Reader) for capturing screens and demonstrations.

Live Dwango Reader (livedoor Reader) の画面をキャプチャとかデモとかするときのために、IDとかフィードとか数とかを隠します。
info.additionalInfo:
2017-10-01 add support for livedwango.com
2017-08-14 just fix misspell of the name...
2017-05-02 fixed id font size
2017-05-02 initial release
